start.en: Hello there! Please select your language:

cancel.en: Action cancelled. Please send /start to configure the bot again.

error.en: Your message doesn't appear to be a @username or a URL. Please try again.

error_link.en: This does not appear to be a valid link. Please try again.

error_feed.en: The RSS feed appears to be missing elements, or is malformed.

error_entries.en: The articles in the RSS feed appear to be missing elements or are malformed.

empty_feed.en: is empty, but has nonetheless been added to your list of RSS feeds.

repeated_rss.en: You are already subscribed to this RSS feed.

rss_success.en: has been successfuly added to your list of RSS feeds.

stats.en:
here you go you creep:
- total users: {0}

text.en: Hello there! Please select your preffered language:
Language set to English Now, choose how you'd like to set up your news:
Manual Entry Great! Currently we support Telegram Channels and RSS feeds. For channels, send a @username and for RSS feeds send corresponding links.
Explore Great! Send me a list of topics you'd like to see in your news feeds with a simple list of of words or phrases, each separated by a comma. For example: US News, Astronomy, Telegram

text2.en: Suggestions for channels and RSS feeds to follow have been compiled. Select which ones you'd like to follow by clicking the buttons below:

text.en: Menu {name} is currently subscribed to {rss_num} RSS feeds, {channel_num} Telegram Channels and using this service since {time}

3.1.text: Modify RSS How would you like to modify your RSS feeds?

3.2.text: Modify Channels How would you like to modify your Telegram Channels?
